function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Older adults being advised to remain at home and avoid social contact during COVID-19 lockdown.","Impact":"Increased risk of social isolation, mental health issues, and reduced physical activity.","Mitigation":"Provide access to mental health support, virtual social connections, and at-home physical activity resources.","Technologies":"Virtual communication platforms, telehealth services, and online exercise programs.","People":"Older adults aged >70 years.","Owner":"Healthcare providers, community organizations, and family members."},{"Description":"Postponement of planned follow-up due to COVID-19 pandemic.","Impact":"Delay in monitoring and addressing health status and potential changes in cognitive, medical, and psychosocial well-being of participants.","Mitigation":"Implement remote monitoring and assessment strategies, provide virtual healthcare consultations, and promote self-reporting of health status.","Technologies":"Remote monitoring devices, telemedicine platforms, and digital health applications.","People":"Research team, healthcare providers, and participants.","Owner":"Research team, healthcare providers, and technology developers."},{"Description":"Use of existing data and online survey during the COVID-19 pandemic for research purposes.","Impact":"Potential privacy and data security risks for participants and the need for ethical considerations in data usage.","Mitigation":"Ensure data anonymization, secure data transmission, and compliance with ethical guidelines and regulations for research data usage.","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure survey platforms, and ethical data governance frameworks.","People":"Research team, data privacy experts, and participants.","Owner":"Research team, data privacy experts, and regulatory authorities."}]}
